summary: Command‑line script that sets up argument parsing, loads the Elliptic transaction graph dataset, builds an EvolveGCN model (either hidden‑state or output‑gate variant), and runs a training loop with PyTorch and DGL, measuring performance with utility metrics.
business_intent: Allow users to train evolving graph convolutional networks for fraud/illicit activity detection on cryptocurrency transaction graphs, facilitating research and development of graph‑based anomaly detection models.
